Title: Verify Expired Coupon Error Message
Description: Verify that a user receives an atomic error message when attempting to apply a coupon code that has expired.
Pre-conditions: Valid expired coupon exists in the system.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the Home Page.
2. Add any item to the Cart.
3. Navigate to the Cart Page.
4. Enter an expired coupon code.
5. Click 'Apply Coupon'.
Expected Result: Error message 'This coupon has expired.' is displayed to the user.

Title: Verify Free Shipping Banner on Home Page
Description: Ensure the free shipping promotional banner is visible on the Home Page to encourage higher order value.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the Home Page.
2. Observe the top notification bar.
Expected Result: The banner text 'Free shipping on orders over $50' is clearly visible.

Title: Verify Free Shipping Banner on Cart Page
Description: Ensure the free shipping promotional banner is visible on the Cart Page.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the Cart Page.
2. Observe the top notification bar.
Expected Result: The banner text 'Free shipping on orders over $50' is clearly visible.

Title: Verify Free Shipping Banner on Checkout Page
Description: Ensure the free shipping promotional banner is visible on the Checkout Page.
Pre-conditions: Items in cart to access checkout.
Steps:
1. Add an item to the cart.
2. Navigate to the Checkout Page.
3. Observe the top notification bar.
Expected Result: The banner text 'Free shipping on orders over $50' is clearly visible.

Title: Verify Free Shipping Banner Not on My Account
Description: Ensure the visual clutter is minimized by verifying the free shipping banner does NOT appear on the My Account page.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the My Account Page.
2. Observe the top notification bar area.
Expected Result: The free shipping banner is NOT displayed.

Title: Guest User Checkout End-to-End Flow
Description: Verify that a guest user can successfully complete a purchase using a free coupon code.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Home Page.
2. Add an item to the Cart.
3. Navigate to the Cart Page.
4. Apply a valid free coupon.
5. Proceed to Checkout.
6. Enter valid billing details.
7. Click 'Place Order'.
Expected Result: User is redirected to Order Received page. Order is successfully created in the database.

Title: Verify Product Grid Display
Description: Smoke test to ensure the main product grid renders the correct number of products on load.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the Home Page.
2. Count the number of product cards displayed in the main grid.
Expected Result: Exactly 16 products are displayed.

Title: Verify Home Page Heading
Description: Ensure the main shop heading is present and correct.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the Home Page.
2. Locate the main page heading.
Expected Result: The heading text reads 'Shop'.

Title: Verify Main Navigation Menu
Description: Ensure all primary navigation menu items are rendered.
Steps: 1. detailed check of the header section.
Expected Result: Home, Cart, Checkout, and My Account links are visible.

Title: Verify Login Failure for Non-Existing User
Description: Ensure appropriate security feedback is given when logging in with a non-existent username.
Steps:
1. Navigate to My Account page.
2. Enter a non-existent username.
3. Enter any password.
4. Click Login.
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Error: The username... is not registered on this site.'

Title: New User Registration
Description: Verify a visitor can register a new account.
Steps:
1. Navigate to My Account page.
2. Enter a new email address.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click Register.
Expected Result: User is registered and immediately signed in.

Title: Existing User Login
Description: Verify an existing user can log in with valid credentials.
Steps:
1. Create user via API (or use existing).
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Enter username and password.
4. Click Login.
Expected Result: User is logged in; account/dashboard is visible.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Page Loads
Description: Smoke: Logged-in My Account page loads and shows account area (not login form).
Pre-conditions: User is logged in (session established via fixture).
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session (API/cookie or fixture).
2. Navigate to My Account.
Expected Result: Account area is visible; login/register form is NOT shown; Log out link is visible.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Left Nav Present
Description: Smoke: Left sidebar shows all expected account navigation links.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Observe left sidebar.
Expected Result: Left nav shows Dashboard Orders Downloads Addresses Account details Log out.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Main Content Visible
Description: Smoke: Main content area is visible (default tab).
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Observe main content area.
Expected Result: Main content area is visible (Dashboard or default tab content).

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Log Out Link Visible
Description: Smoke: Log out link is present and visible in left nav.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Locate Log out in left nav.
Expected Result: Log out link is visible and present in left sidebar.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Breadcrumb Shows My Account
Description: Smoke: Breadcrumb trail includes My account.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Observe breadcrumb.
Expected Result: Breadcrumb contains 'My account'. (e.g. Home > My account > ...)

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Account Details Tab
Description: Smoke: Account details tab opens and shows key form elements.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Click Account details in left nav.
4. Observe form.
Expected Result: Account details section visible: First name Last name Display name Email address; Password change section; Save changes button.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Header Nav Visible
Description: Smoke: Header navigation is present when logged in.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Observe header.
Expected Result: Header shows expected menu items (e.g. Home Cart Checkout My account Sample Page).

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Orders Tab Opens
Description: Regression: Orders tab opens and order section content is visible.
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session.
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Click Orders in left nav.
4. Observe main content area.
Expected Result: Orders section is visible; order table or empty state is displayed.

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Orders Tab Empty State
Description: Regression: When user has no orders the Orders tab shows empty state message.
Pre-conditions: User is logged in with no order history (e.g. my_account_smoke_user).
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session (user with no orders).
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Click Orders in left nav.
4. Observe content.
Expected Result: Empty state message is displayed (e.g. 'No order has been made yet' or equivalent).

Title: My Account (Logged In) – Orders Tab Shows Order List
Description: Regression: When user has at least one order the Orders tab shows at least one order in the list.
Pre-conditions: User is logged in with at least one order (e.g. user_with_one_order).
Steps:
1. Establish logged-in session (user with orders).
2. Navigate to My Account.
3. Click Orders in left nav.
4. Observe order list.
Expected Result: At least one order row/link is visible in the order list.

Title: Verify Product Name on PDP
Description: Ensure the product detail page (PDP) displays the correct product title.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Observe product title.
Expected Result: Title matches the product database/API record.

Title: Verify Main Product Image
Description: Ensure the main product image loads correctly on the PDP.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Inspect the main image element.
Expected Result: Main image source URL is correct and image is visible.

Title: Verify Product Image Gallery
Description: Ensure product thumbnails/gallery images are displayed.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Inspect thumbnail images.
Expected Result: All secondary images associated with product are visible.

Title: Verify Variable Product Indicator
Description: Ensure the customer is informed that the product is variable.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check for type description text.
Expected Result: Text 'This is a variable product' is present.

Title: Verify Price Range Display
Description: Ensure the price range is displayed for variable products.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Observe price section.
Expected Result: Price HTML matches the expected price range.

Title: Verify Add to Cart Button Visibility
Description: Ensure the Add to Cart button is present on the page.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Locate 'Add to cart' button.
Expected Result: Button is visible with text 'Add to cart'.

Title: Verify Quantity Field Default
Description: Ensure the quantity input defaults to 1.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check quantity input value.
Expected Result: Default value is '1'.

Title: Verify Product SKU
Description: Ensure the correct SKU is displayed.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check SKU field.
Expected Result: SKU matches the product record.

Title: Verify Product Category
Description: Ensure the correct Category is displayed.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check Category field.
Expected Result: Category matches the product record.

Title: Verify Product Description
Description: Ensure the full product description is rendered correctly.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Read product description.
Expected Result: Description text matches the API record.

Title: Verify Description Section Header
Description: Ensure the standard 'Description' header exists.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Locate description section.
Expected Result: Header text is 'Description'.

Title: Verify Related Products Header
Description: Ensure the 'Related products' section exists.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Locate related products section.
Expected Result: Header text is 'Related products'.

Title: Verify Related Products List
Description: Ensure related products are displayed with images.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. UI check of related products.
Expected Result: Up to 3 related products are displayed with valid images.

Title: Verify Product Tabs
Description: Ensure all standard informational tabs are present.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check left navigation tabs.
Expected Result: Tabs 'Description', 'Additional information', and 'Reviews' are present.

Title: Verify Color Attribute Label
Description: Ensure the Color dropdown is correctly labeled.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check color selector label.
Expected Result: Label reads 'Color'.

Title: Verify Logo Attribute Label
Description: Ensure the Logo dropdown is correctly labeled.
Steps:
1. Open PDP for a variable product.
2. Check logo selector label.
Expected Result: Label reads 'Logo'.

Title: Add Variable Product to Cart
Description: Verify user can select options and add to cart.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Select Color: 'Blue'.
3. Select Logo: 'Yes'.
4. Click 'Add to cart'.
5. View Cart.
Expected Result: Product 'Hoodie - Blue, Yes' is present in the cart.

Title: Verify Option Counts
Description: Ensure the dropdowns contain the correct number of choices.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Expand Color and Logo dropdowns.
Expected Result: Color has 4 options; Logo has 3 options (including defaults).

Title: Verify Color Options Content
Description: Ensure the Color dropdown contains specific values.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Inspect Color dropdown values.
Expected Result: Contains: Blue, Green, Red.

Title: Verify Logo Options Content
Description: Ensure the Logo dropdown contains specific values.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Inspect Logo dropdown values.
Expected Result: Contains: Yes, No.

Title: Clear Selection (Color Only)
Description: Verify the 'Reset' button functions when only one attribute is selected.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Select 'Green'.
3. Click 'Clear/Reset' link.
Expected Result: Color selection reverts to 'Choose an option'.

Title: Clear Selection (Logo Only)
Description: Verify the 'Reset' button functions when only one attribute is selected.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Select 'No'.
3. Click 'Clear/Reset' link.
Expected Result: Logo selection reverts to 'Choose an option'.

Title: Clear Selection (Both Attributes)
Description: Verify the 'Reset' button clears all attributes.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Hoodie PDP.
2. Select 'Green' and 'No'.
3. Click 'Clear/Reset' link.
Expected Result: Both dropdowns revert to 'Choose an option'.

Title: Verify Product Name on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the Beanie product detail page displays the correct product title.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP (e.g. /product/beanie/).
2. Observe product title.
Expected Result: Title displays 'Beanie'.

Title: Verify Main Product Image on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the main product image loads correctly on the Beanie PDP.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Inspect the main image element.
Expected Result: Main image is visible and loads correctly.

Title: Verify Simple Product Type Text
Description: Ensure the customer is informed that the product is simple (not variable).
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Check for type description text.
Expected Result: Text 'This is a simple product.' is present.

Title: Verify Single Price Display (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure a single price is displayed (not a range) for the simple product.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Observe price section.
Expected Result: Single current price is displayed (e.g. $18.00).

Title: Verify Sale Price Display (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure original and sale price are shown when product is on sale.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Observe price section.
Expected Result: Original price (e.g. $20.00) and current price (e.g. $18.00) are displayed.

Title: Verify Add to Cart Button on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the Add to Cart button is present on the Beanie page.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Locate 'Add to cart' button.
Expected Result: Button is visible with text 'Add to cart'.

Title: Verify Quantity Field Default on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the quantity input defaults to 1 on Beanie PDP.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Check quantity input value.
Expected Result: Default value is '1'.

Title: Verify SKU on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the correct SKU is displayed for Beanie.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Check SKU field.
Expected Result: SKU displays 'woo-beanie'.

Title: Verify Category on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the correct Category is displayed for Beanie.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Check Category field.
Expected Result: Category displays 'Accessories'.

Title: Verify Description Section on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the Description header and content are rendered on Beanie PDP.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Locate description section and read content.
Expected Result: Header is 'Description' and description text is present.

Title: Verify Additional Information Section (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure the Additional information tab/section exists and shows product attributes (e.g. Color: Red).
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Open 'Additional information' tab/section.
3. Verify content.
Expected Result: Additional information section shows expected attributes (e.g. Color: Red).

Title: Verify Related Products on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure Related products section and list are displayed on Beanie PDP.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Locate related products section.
Expected Result: Header is 'Related products' and related product items (e.g. Belt Sunglasses  Beanie with Logo) are displayed with images.

Title: Verify Product Tabs on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Ensure all standard tabs are present on Beanie PDP.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Check tab labels.
Expected Result: Tabs 'Description', 'Additional information', and 'Reviews' are present.

Title: Add Simple Product to Cart
Description: Verify user can add Beanie to cart without selecting options and product appears in cart.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Click 'Add to cart'.
3. View Cart.
Expected Result: Product 'Beanie' is present in the cart.

Title: Verify Free Shipping Banner on PDP
Description: Ensure the free shipping promotional banner is visible on the Product Detail Page (e.g. Beanie).
Steps:
1. Navigate to any PDP (e.g. Beanie).
2. Observe the top notification bar.
Expected Result: The banner text 'Free shipping on orders over $50' is clearly visible.

Title: Verify Breadcrumb on PDP (Simple Product)
Description: Breadcrumb must be visible and contain the product name (Beanie).
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Locate breadcrumb.
Expected Result: Breadcrumb is visible and contains 'Beanie'.

Title: Verify Sale Badge Visible When Product on Sale
Description: When product is on sale the Sale! badge must be visible on PDP.
Steps:
1. Set Beanie on sale via API.
2. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
3. Observe sale badge.
Expected Result: Sale badge (e.g. 'Sale!') is visible.

Title: Verify Sale Badge Not Visible When Not on Sale
Description: When product is not on sale the Sale! badge must not be visible.
Steps:
1. Ensure Beanie is not on sale via API.
2. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
3. Observe sale badge area.
Expected Result: Sale badge is not displayed.

Title: Verify Quantity Field Accepts Value on PDP
Description: Quantity input must accept and display a value (e.g. 3).
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Enter quantity 3 in quantity field.
3. Verify displayed value.
Expected Result: Quantity field displays '3'.

Title: Add Simple Product to Cart with Quantity 2
Description: User can set quantity to 2 add to cart and see quantity 2 in cart.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Beanie PDP.
2. Set quantity to 2.
3. Click 'Add to cart'.
4. View Cart.
Expected Result: Cart shows Beanie with quantity 2.

Title: Reviews Tab Opens and Content Visible
Description: Verify the Reviews tab can be opened and its content panel is visible.
Steps:
1. Navigate to PDP (e.g. Beanie).
2. Click Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Reviews tab content panel is visible; no error.

Title: Zero Reviews – Empty State Text
Description: When product has no reviews the empty state message is displayed.
Steps:
1. Ensure product has 0 reviews (API).
2. Navigate to PDP.
3. Open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: 'There are no reviews yet' (or equivalent) is visible.

Title: Review Form Required Fields Present
Description: Review form contains rating review text name email and submit.
Steps:
1. Navigate to PDP.
2. Open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Rating selector review text input name input email input and submit button are present.

Title: Submit Review Without Rating – Validation
Description: Submitting without a rating shows validation.
Steps:
1. Open PDP Reviews tab.
2. Fill review text name email; leave rating empty.
3. Submit.
Expected Result: Validation message shown; review not submitted.

Title: Submit Review Without Review Text – Validation
Description: Submitting without review text shows validation.
Steps:
1. Open PDP Reviews tab.
2. Select rating fill name email; leave review text empty.
3. Submit.
Expected Result: Validation message shown; review not submitted.

Title: Submit Review Without Name – Validation
Description: Submitting without name shows validation.
Steps:
1. Open PDP Reviews tab.
2. Fill rating review text email; leave name empty.
3. Submit.
Expected Result: Validation message shown; review not submitted.

Title: Submit Review Without Email – Validation
Description: Submitting without email shows validation.
Steps:
1. Open PDP Reviews tab.
2. Fill rating review text name; leave email empty.
3. Submit.
Expected Result: Validation message shown; review not submitted.

Title: Submit Review With Invalid Email – Validation
Description: Submitting with invalid email format shows validation.
Steps:
1. Open PDP Reviews tab.
2. Fill rating review text name; enter invalid email (e.g. 'notanemail').
3. Submit.
Expected Result: Validation message shown; review not submitted.

Title: Submit Valid Review via UI – Review Appears
Description: Customer submits a valid review and it appears in the list.
Steps:
1. Navigate to PDP.
2. Open Reviews tab.
3. Fill rating (e.g. 5) review text name email.
4. Submit.
5. Reload or wait for display.
Expected Result: Review appears in list with correct rating and content.

Title: After UI Submit – Tab Count Updates
Description: After submitting a review the Reviews tab count updates.
Pre-conditions: Product had 0 reviews; user submits one.
Steps:
1. Submit one review via UI (or ensure 1 review exists).
2. Observe Reviews tab label.
Expected Result: Tab shows 'Reviews (1)' (or incremented count).

Title: Submitted Review Shows Correct Author
Description: Submitted review displays the entered author name.
Steps:
1. Submit review via UI with known name.
2. Locate the new review in the list.
Expected Result: Review shows the submitted author name.

Title: Create Review via API – Appears on PDP
Description: Review created via API appears on PDP Reviews tab.
Steps:
1. Create one product review via API (rating content reviewer).
2. Navigate to PDP.
3. Open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Review text rating and reviewer (if shown) match API payload.

Title: Create N Reviews via API – Tab and List Match
Description: After creating N reviews via API tab label and list count match.
Steps:
1. Create N reviews via API for product (e.g. N=3).
2. Navigate to PDP.
3. Open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Tab shows 'Reviews (N)' and list shows N reviews.

Title: Five Star Review Display
Description: Review with 5-star rating shows 5 stars on PDP.
Steps:
1. Create 5-star review via API.
2. Navigate to PDP; open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: UI shows 5 filled stars (or '5' rating).

Title: Four Star Review Display
Description: Review with 4-star rating shows 4 stars on PDP.
Steps:
1. Create 4-star review via API.
2. Navigate to PDP; open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: UI shows 4 filled stars (or '4' rating).

Title: Three Star Review Display
Description: Review with 3-star rating shows 3 stars on PDP.
Steps:
1. Create 3-star review via API.
2. Navigate to PDP; open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: UI shows 3 filled stars (or '3' rating).

Title: One Star Review Display
Description: Review with 1-star rating shows 1 star on PDP.
Steps:
1. Create 1-star review via API.
2. Navigate to PDP; open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: UI shows 1 filled star (or '1' rating).

Title: Mixed Ratings – Average Displayed
Description: Product with mixed ratings shows correct average rating.
Steps:
1. Create reviews with different ratings (e.g. 3 4 5) via API.
2. Navigate to PDP.
Expected Result: Average rating displayed matches expected (e.g. 4.0).

Title: Mixed Ratings – Review Count Correct
Description: Product with multiple reviews shows correct total count.
Steps:
1. Create multiple reviews via API.
2. Navigate to PDP; open Reviews tab.
Expected Result: 'Reviews (N)' and number of review items match API count.

Title: Single Review Display
Description: Product with exactly one review displays it correctly.
Steps:
1. Ensure product has 1 review (API).
2. Open PDP Reviews tab.
Expected Result: One review visible; rating content and author match.

Title: Many Reviews – List or Pagination
Description: Product with many reviews (e.g. 10+) displays list correctly.
Steps:
1. Create 10+ reviews via API.
2. Open PDP Reviews tab.
Expected Result: All reviews visible or pagination works; count correct.

Title: Review With Long Text – Display
Description: Review with long comment text displays correctly.
Steps:
1. Create review via API with long content.
2. Open PDP Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Long text displayed (full or truncated appropriately).

Title: Review With Special Characters – Display
Description: Review content with special characters displays correctly.
Steps:
1. Create review via API with special chars (e.g. < > &).
2. Open PDP Reviews tab.
Expected Result: Content displays correctly (escaped or safe).

Title: Review Form Save Details Checkbox Present
Description: Verify the 'Save my name email and website in this browser for the next time I comment' checkbox is present on the review form.
Steps:
1. Navigate to PDP.
2. Open Reviews tab.
3. Locate the review form.
Expected Result: Checkbox with label 'Save my name email and website in this browser for the next time I comment' is visible.
